sentences.en: Additionally, staff should improve quality to become all - rounders.
sentences.cn: 三是员工应提高综合素质成为多面手.

sentences.en: Baseball originated from cricket and an old English game called rounders.
sentences.cn: 棒球起源于板球以及一种被称做弧形球的游戏.

sentences.en: She's equally good at running and jumping and is one of the team's best all rounders.
sentences.cn: 她擅长跑又擅长跳,是该队最好的全能运动员.

trans.tran_en: a ball game in which players run between posts after hitting the ball, scoring a 'rounder' if they run round all four before the ball is retrieved
